title: Verify Landing Page Loads Successfully
description: Ensure the IPNOTEC.VIP landing page loads fully within 2 seconds with all hero section animations playing smoothly at 60fps.

steps.description: Open the IPNOTEC.VIP landing page URL.
Verify the page loads completely in under 2 seconds on standard internet connection.
Verify hero section animations and parallax effects run smoothly at 60fps without glitches.
Verify floating glassmorphic navigation bar is visible and sticky on scroll.

title: Validate I-ID Creation Multi-step Form
description: Check that the I-ID creation form validates user inputs correctly with real-time availability check under 500ms and prevents submission on invalid data.

steps.description: Navigate to the I-ID creation form via primary CTA on the landing page.
Enter a valid unique I-ID and observe real-time availability feedback.
Confirm that availability check completes within 500ms and shows correct availability status.
Attempt to enter invalid I-ID formats and ensure error messages display instantly.
Verify user cannot proceed to next step if I-ID input is invalid or unavailable.
Complete all steps of multi-step I-ID creation form with valid inputs.
Verify the form allows submission and progresses correctly to registration steps.

title: Registration Form Validation with Progress Tracking
description: Test the multi-step user registration form for proper input validation, progress indicators, and error handling for personal details.

steps.description: Fill in each step of the registration form with valid personal details.
Verify that progress indicators update accurately as user completes each step.
Input invalid data formats such as incorrect email, missing required fields, or improper phone numbers.
Verify that descriptive error messages appear instantaneously powered by React Hook Form and Zod for each invalid field.
Try to submit the form with incomplete or invalid data.
Confirm that submission is blocked and relevant error messages are shown.
Complete valid form data and submit.
Verify successful form submission and navigation to the avatar customization step.

title: Avatar Customization Flow and Live Preview
description: Verify the six-step avatar customization engine functions correctly with interactive selection and real-time live preview updates.

steps.description: Navigate to the avatar customization section after registration.
Complete each of the six customization steps selecting avatar features.
Verify the live preview updates instantly to reflect each user selection.
Test edge cases such as rapid option changes, skipping optional steps (if any), and invalid input if applicable.
Confirm no errors occur and selections remain consistent when navigating back and forth.

title: Payment Processing via Razorpay
description: Test secure payment gateway integration that supports multiple payment methods and displays confirmation with receipt generation.

steps.description: Proceed to the payment page after completing registration and avatar customization.
Initiate payment through Razorpay modal selecting various supported methods (credit card, UPI, wallets).
Verify payment modal loads correctly and securely.
Complete a successful transaction using each payment method.
Confirm payment processing is secure, receipt is generated, and confirmation is shown.
Simulate payment failure scenarios (declined cards, network error).
Verify appropriate error messages display and user can retry payment.

title: User Dashboard Functionality Verification
description: Ensure the post-payment dashboard displays I-ID, avatar gallery, payment history, and profile editing with accurate data and updates.

steps.description: Login or access the dashboard post payment completion.
Verify I-ID is correctly displayed and matches the user created.
Verify avatar gallery shows all customized avatars with accurate visuals.
Verify payment history lists all completed transactions with correct status and details.
Edit profile information and save changes.
Confirm profile updates persist and reflect correctly in UI.
Attempt invalid profile updates and verify validation errors.

title: Responsive Design and Mobile Optimization
description: Verify landing page and registration flows render correctly on various devices including desktops, tablets, and smartphones with functional mobile menu.

steps.description: Access the landing page on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Verify glassmorphic navigation bar adapts correctly and mobile menu toggles and navigates sections smoothly.
Verify responsiveness of hero section, forms, avatar builder, countdown timer, and final CTA across screen sizes.
Verify no layout breakage, text truncation, or overflow issues.

title: Accessibility Compliance Check
description: Ensure the application meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and sufficient color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate the landing page and all forms using keyboard only.
Verify all interactive elements are focusable and usable via keyboard.
Use a screen reader to navigate key sections and forms.
Verify all UI elements provide appropriate ARIA labels and descriptive text is read correctly.
Check color contrast ratios for text and UI components meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

title: Latency and Performance Under Slow Network Conditions
description: Test application behavior under slow or fluctuating network conditions ensuring the user flow is resilient and users receive appropriate feedback.

steps.description: Simulate slow network latency and load the landing page and forms.
Verify page and animations load with graceful degradation and do not block primary flows.
During I-ID availability check, simulate slow backend response.
Verify availability feedback eventually appears and user is informed appropriately if delays occur.
Simulate slow payment gateway response.
Verify user is shown a loading indicator and can retry if payment times out.

title: Security and Session Management Validation
description: Validate input sanitization, secure session handling, and PCI DSS compliance elements for safe user data and payment processing.

steps.description: Attempt cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks in all form fields.
Verify input sanitization blocks or escapes malicious scripts.
Test session timeout by remaining idle after login/dashboard access.
Confirm user is logged out automatically and redirected to login/landing page after timeout.
Inspect payment integration for PCI DSS compliance features.
Verify no sensitive payment data is exposed client-side and secure transmission protocols are enforced.

title: Cross-Browser and Device Compatibility
description: Ensure the platform functions correctly and UI is consistent across supported browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and various devices.

steps.description: Open the landing page on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge browsers on desktop and mobile.
Verify all visual components, animations, forms, and navigation work correctly without layout or functional issues.
Perform primary user flows including I-ID creation, registration, avatar customization, payment, and dashboard access on each browser.
Confirm consistent behavior and absence of browser-specific bugs.

title: Session Timeout and User Activity Handling
description: Test secondary flows to ensure idle session detection, auto-logout, and user data protection during inactivity.

steps.description: Log in and remain inactive for session timeout duration.
Verify the user is automatically logged out and session data cleared.
Attempt form continuation or dashboard access after session expiry.
Confirm user is redirected to login or landing page and warned about session expiration.
